Html:
Hi,

My Application need to write (record) the current playing song into MP3 file stream. I know there is a class "WaveFileWriter" which is used to write .wav file. I wanted to know

1. How to write current chunk of buffer into MP3 Stream.

2. Which place of NAudio exactly I should plug-in my code to write the current chunk. ( I used OnDone function of WaveOutBuffer to grab the current chunk to write into wave format)

3. Is there any class MP3FileWriter ??

Thanks,

No, I'm afraid there is no MP3 writer in NAudio. I recommend using LAME

Mark
